original_text: ‘But wicked people are like a rough sea with dangerous waves. It cannot stay still. Its waves throw up mud and dirt. ‘But wicked people are like a rough sea
korean_text: 그러나 악인은 평온함을 얻지 못하고 그 물이 진흙과 더러운 것을 늘 솟구쳐 내는 요동하는 바다와 같으니라

sentences.original_text: But wicked people are like a rough sea
Its waves throw up mud and dirt
sentences.korean_translation: 그 파도들은 진흙과 오물을 던져 올립니다
